parameters.query:
select topic_name, from_username, from_first_name, from_last_name, tg_user_id, date, text
from v_tg_message_flat
where date >= '{{ $node['Schedule Trigger'].json.timestamp.toDateTime().startOf('day').minus(1, 'days').format('yyyy-MM-dd') }}'
and not is_bot
order by topic_name, date

values.prompt:
Write a concise summary of the following in Russian:


"{text}"

Refer to each participant as their @username.
Extract actionables and responsible individuals, list it separately under summary.
List questions that were not answered.
Don't refer to TNR organization as a shelter. КК refers to котоквартира -- an apartment where cats heal after castration.
List cats that found their homes.

CONCISE SUMMARY:

Write a very short and concise summary of the following in Russian, try keeping the output under 150 tokens:


"{text}"

Don't refer to TNR organization as a shelter. КК refers to котоквартира -- an apartment where cats heal after castration. Don't escape @usernames with ``.

CONCISE SUMMARY:

assignments.name: text
assignments.value:
=### Топик: {{ $node['Does the topic need summary?'].json.topic_name }} ({{ $node['Does the topic need summary?'].json.length }} сообщений)

{{ $json.output.text }}

assignments.name: text
assignments.value:
=### Топик: {{ $node['Does the topic need summary?'].json.topic_name }} ({{ $node['Does the topic need summary?'].json.length }} сообщений)

{{ $json.dialog }}

additionalFields.caption:
=_Я в режиме отладки, могу генерировать кринж\._

{{ $json.markdownText.slice(0, 2000) }}

=*Ежедневная сводка из рабочего чата Catebi*

_Данные собраны нейросетью, нейросети часто врут и пишут кринж\._

Что происходило `{{ $today.minus(1, 'days').format('yyyy-MM-dd') }}`?

{{ $json.markdownText.slice(0, 850) }}

value.text: =major topics: {{ $('Merge PDF Data').item.json.major_topics }}; major topic summaries: {{ $('Merge PDF Data').item.json.summaries }}; minor topics: {{ $('Merge PDF Data').item.json.minor_topics }}; minor topic dialogs: {{ $('Merge PDF Data').item.json.dialogs }}
